S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam: ) Anu baliyusan, tahekal amin ku 'ulang atu tuda. . tahekal nanu makayza i wali tahekal kiya cilal. . pulungen nu mita pahanhan a tahekal. . hekal maudad i hekal. . atahekal makabasu kaku atahekal midang. . patahekal patahekal tu kalisiw sapicakay tu kuhi. . patahekalay ci Imi ku patahekalay tu kalisiw. Imi . patahekalen patahekalen ku asu'ay a heci nu kilang! patahekalen kiya asu'ay kakanen! patahekalen niza ku pada mipawali! tahekal nanu makayza i wali tahekal kiya cilal. . pulungen nu mita pahanhan a tahekal. . nuhekal nuhekal a satabu kina dawa. . nuhekalan nuhekalan ku kebutulay a zikuc i kasienawan. . nuhekalan amana kau nuhekalan dada' ku pisakakawaw. . sakihekal caluken ku sakihekal a zikuc! sapatahekal pinaenta ku sapatahekal tu nubu i cinizaan? katahekal katahekal miazih tu bunac. . katahekalan katahekalan kina zazan a tayza i umah. .
